Welcome to

Foody Indian Mom

Home to healthy food recipes

Our Philosophy

Foody Indian Mom is an expression of love and an attempt to share our love for Indian cuisine with all of you.

Our mission is to share food recipes from all parts of India and hopefully get you also to fall in love with Indian cuisine.

Featured Recipes

Curd Chilli

Sides

Dahi Mirchi is a mouthwatering Maharashtrian recipe, served as a side dish in any indian thali. Dahi Mirchi enhances the taste of food items served in thali.

Video Recipe

Moong Dal Upma

Snacks

Steamed Moong Dal Upma is a healthy breakfast option for people who want to eat something healthy and can be prepared within a couple of minutes.

Video Recipe

Kadhai Paneer

Curries

Kadhai Paneer is the most famous Paneer gravy dish across the world. Kadhai Paneer originated from North India, now liked by every tenth person in the world.

Video Recipe

Aloo Matar Poha

Snacks

Aloo Matar Poha is a simple, easy to make, quick breakfast made with flattened Rice, Peanuts, Onions, different Spices, Potatoes and Green peas.

Video Recipe
